data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
PSG's Angel Di Maria misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 1, Jerome Miguelgorry awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Parc des Princes.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Strasbourg.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 7, PSG to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
PSG pushes forward through Rafinha, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Jeanricner Bellegarde for Strasbourg drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Strasbourg throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to PSG.
In Paris PSG's Kylian Mbappe is caught offside.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, PSG have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Goal! Timothee Pembele gives PSG a 1-0 lead in Paris.
PSG have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Strasbourg's Ludovic Ajorque is whistled for offside at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 26, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to PSG.
Free kick Strasbourg.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
In the minute 33, Jerome Miguelgorry awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Angel Di Maria for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 36, Can PSG capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
PSG have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Strasbourg.
Rafinha of PSG smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 44, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kenny Lala gets his shot on target but fails to score for Strasbourg.
The first-half has come to a close in Paris.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Parc des Princes.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
PSG are coming forward and Angel Di Maria gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
PSG have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Strasbourg's area.
Free kick in a good position for PSG!
In the minute 61, PSG are pushing forward but Kylian Mbappe's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to PSG.
In the minute 64, Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a first substitution, with Sanjin Prcic replacing Dimitri Lienard.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Paris to check on Mohamed Simakan, who is grimacing with pain.
PSG's Rafinha gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
Strasbourgâ€™s Mohamed Simakan is on his feet again at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 70, PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Throw-in PSG.
In the minute 72, Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In Paris, Rafinha (PSG) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Sanjin Prcic of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Jerome Miguelgorry awards PSG a goal kick.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for PSG in the half of Strasbourg.
Thierry Laurey is making the team's second substitution at Parc des Princes with Habib Diallo replacing Jeanricner Bellegarde.
Idrissa Gueye is replacing Ander Herrera for the home team.
In the minute 79, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Kylian Mbappe extends PSG's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Angel Di Maria to set up the goal.
In the minute 81, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Julian Draxler is replacing Rafinha for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Strasbourg throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 84, PSG make their third substitution with Moise Kean replacing Kylian Mbappe.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Mohamed Simakan is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Paris.
Mohamed Simakan is back on his feet again.
In the minute 88, PSG take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Idrissa Gueye.
Julian Draxler instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Parc des Princes. The final score is 4-0.
The home team have replaced Angel Di Maria with Bandiougou Fadiga. This is the fourth substitution made today by Thomas Tuchel.
Mohamed Simakan (Strasbourg) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Mehdi Chahiri.
Goal! PSG extend their lead to 4-0 through Moise Kean.
